Yanshosh ignorance? Allright, the only reason I'm replying to this is
to argue that statement. I don't think I'm quite that ignorant to
forget the history of a faction that my character had a major part of
creating, and had led ever since. As I remember it, my version is
accurate, and if you can tell me what's wrong about it, I'll admit my
mistake. But I've been with the Alliance about 20 times longer than
you, UnderT, so I would know its history very well.

::FZ::

FZ nodded. "You can say that, yes."

He wasn't sure whether Wolfgang would try to take control or not, but
if he would ... well, there were three armed troops loyal to FZ in the
room, and the Iron Fist had very good internal defences.

"Its been a long time after you were last online, Wolfgang. How are
you feeling?"
